modName: Craftable Water Arrows and Dousable Sconces
summary: Create water arrows and fire them above sconses the douse their flaming torches. Sconces must be of the removable torch type to work.
descriptionHtml:
==============
Craftable Water Arrows and Extinguishable Sconces

By: MofoMojo
==============

Check videos for preview and the 1.1 update for dousing carried torches

==============
Description
==============
This is my 1.1 release, we\'ll still call it a beta, of craftable water arrows and extinguishable sconces. You may currently craft Water Arrows at the forge with Ale :) and 30 Iron Arrows. They do very little damage, so they\'re mostly good for just putting out sconces. 

Not only will it douse lit sconce torches, it will temporarily douse torches carried by others. The closest actor within a certain distance of the shot will be \"doused\" and have the flame of their torch extinguished. 

==============
Features
==============
Craft Water Arrows and then douse torches in sconces from afar. 
Temporarily Douse torches carried by actors (30 seconds)


================
Current Version Changes
================
1.1
Includes ability to douse carried torches from nearby actors when the arrow hits its target.
Fixed \"extenguished\" to \"extinguished\"

1.0
Beta - Initial release. Place holder art for arrows, and need a better recipe. 

================
HOW TO INSTALL
================

--------------
==Plugin==
--------------
-Open the Skyrim launcher
-Click on data files
-Check \"mm_WAWaterArrows\"

---------
==In Game==
---------
Craft water arrows at the forge with Ale and 30 Iron Arrows for 30 Water Arrows. 

---------------
==Other Notes==
---------------
I highly recommend using HaploTR\'s Dynamic Torches mod which replaces over 700 torches in the game with removable torch sconces. See http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8070. This should be compatible with that mod and should really extend its usefulness. 

------------------
==Special Thanks==
------------------
I forgot to include this in the 1.0 update (it\'s in the description on the nexus though). A special thanks to two individuals on the Bethsoft forums who gave me some item swapping suggestions, .NIF editing suggestions, and script tweaks. 
RandomNoob
SLuckyD

Thank you both!!!

-MM
author: MofoMojo
